title: Veiled Sky
description: The bounty is out on Ani Maxima. Her name, her photo, and her exact location is now known to everyone in the entire galaxy. And worse that that - the bounty even includes the exact instructions on how to beat her at her own game.  Nearly a month had passed since Ani Maxima destroyed an alien armada and saved the entire planet. Life was normal again for the farming colony on Cassiopeia… at least up until every electronic device on the planet received a viral photo of Ani with alien instructions on how to kill this powerful SuperVirus. There was no telling what sort of alien bounty hunters would be coming. All that was known was that this time, her superpowers would be useless. The only way to protect Ani would be to protect the entire planet. And the only way to protect the planet would be to call upon some tactics that Ani might have buried deep inside her head from her time on the USS Ptolemy. Perhaps with the assistance of her new friend, a spacecraft engineer from the distant continent, she might find a solution. If only she could get his heart off of her and his focus more on saving the planet.
